item.title: K8s Day One
item.description: It is very nice to build an architecture with cloud services. Hand-on experience is the only way to truly understand the technology. I have to say IBMCloud CLI is easy to use and consistent with the available functionalities on IBM Cloud Console UI. As a programmer/architect, I really enjoy using terminal to config services on my local and deploy to cloud. Also, the tutorial for K8s on IBMCloud is good too!
